page.title: 03CROSSCRAKE CHURCH
page.content: { Crosscrake Chapel}was{founded}in {1190}by{Anselm of Furness.}Towards the end of the{thirteenth century}it was given to{Furness Abbey}by{Sir William {Strickland.}After being allowed to {decay}on{several occasions,}it was {erected}on the{present site}in{1874}at a cost of{Â£4136.}From{1962-4}the {central tower}was{demolished}and {replaced}by a{small steeple}giving the building a{"Swiss design".} The{present vicar}is{Rev. David {Hampson.}The{vicarage}lies approximately{50 metres}to the{east of {the church.}The{building used}as the vicarage until{about 20 years ago}is now a{private house.(SD 521860).
